text: Gari () is a rural locality (a village) in Polozovoskoye Rural Settlement, Bolshesosnovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 51 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located on the Siva River. == References == Category:Rural localities in Bolshesosnovsky District
title: Gari, Bolshesosnovsky District, Perm Krai
